description:
gTech’s Professional Services team takes a creative, collaborative, and customer-centric approach to provide foundational services and forward-looking business solutions to top advertiser and publisher customers. Through technical implementation, optimization, and key solutions, gTech Professional Services helps customers attain their business goals while building long-term capabilities.

Ads Policy is a highly complex and strategic space for Google. It is the highest volume category of requests from advertisers, and offers a unique challenge in balancing the needs of good advertisers with risks and potential fraudulent activity. This is a high profile challenge within the tech industry, and this role is pivotal to the customer experience in that regard.

As a Manager for Ads Policy you are responsible for Product Operations of a growing Google Ads business. This role provides you with a forum to showcase your technical and product management skills, and business judgment as you drive high priority initiatives to support goals and challenges of accelerating serviceability and innovative products globally. This role will be responsible for interfacing with and influencing product, engineering and global sales leadership on a continuous basis, and allows you to make a significant impact on the direction of the business.

Google creates products and services that make the world a better place, and gTech’s role is to help bring them to life. Our teams of solution-oriented trusted advisors support millions of customers globally. Our solutions are rooted in our technical skill, product expertise, and a thorough understanding of our customers’ complex needs. Whether the answer is a bespoke solution to solve a unique problem, or a new tool that can scale across Google, everything we do aims to ensure our customers benefit from the full potential of Google products.

To learn more about gTech, check out our video.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 8 years of experience in the technology industry.
  • 5 years of experience in project management, product management, engineering management, people management, or management consulting.
  • Experience with Policy, Risk and/or Legal issues within Ads or Tech industries.

Preferred qualifications:

  • MBA.
  • Experience managing product lifecycles, from concept to market, and to end-of-life.
  • Experience driving solutions to technically and/or operationally complex challenges.
  • Experience managing increasing responsibilities over time, going from being an individual contributor to team a leader.
  • Ability to communicate with management with excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Excellent relationship building, collaboration, and negotiation skills. Excellent project management, product management, and analytical skills.
responsibilities:
• Manage relationships with leadership in Product Management, Engineering, Sales, and gTech, in order to influence product direction and include services points of view in all aspects of the product lifecycle.
  • Develop a vision, serviceability, and support strategy for Ads Policy and manage a team of high-performing Product Operations Managers and Product Analysts.
  • Identify and deliver business critical processes, tools, metrics, and business insights required to create and maintain excellent Ads product operations and customer usability.
title: Manager, Ads Policy Product Operations
